title: Liverpool rocked by the news that influential midfielder Adam Lallana has been ruled out for a month
text:
Sport Liverpool rocked by the news that influential midfielder Adam Lallana has been ruled out for a month Lallana picked up the injury for England and will now miss crucial games for Liverpool including the Merseyside derby on Saturday Share Lallana suffers major injury blow (Photo: AFP) Share Get Liverpool FC updates   
Liverpool have been rocked by the news that influential midfielder Adam Lallana will be sidelined for four weeks - including the big Merseyside derby against Everton on Saturday. 
The 28-year-old midfielder has been outstanding for Jurgen Kloppâ€™s side and will be badly missed as they prepare for a huge clash against the Toffees on Saturday. 
Lallana has been in superb form for club and country netting three goals and an assist in his last five appearances for England. Klopp is devastated to be without his influential midfielder (Photo: Getty) 
The news will come as a major blow to Klopp as he looks to help Liverpool keep alive their Champions League hopes and cement their position in the top four. 
The Liverpool boss will now to have reshuffle his team once again and still has a major concern over fellow England midfielder Jordan Henderson who, despite travelling with the squad on their warm weather training camp in Tenerife last week, has still not resumed full training. Like us on Facebook
